Name: Skies Of Blue: Remake
About the game: Skies Of Blue Remake is a linear First-Person Puzzle-Platformer in that, you solve level after level by utilizing various tools like Bombs, Keys or Primary Weapon! Every 20 Levels, a boss will appear, blocking your path. Every Level has a collectable hidden in it! Collect them all to unlock something in the 'GAME' section in your settings! With the new Custom Level Builder, you can build your own Levels!
